content: >http://www.thestar.com/News/Canada/article/622994 After being subjected to kidnapping and two months of 'psychological abuse' former Canadian mandarin and now UN representative Bob 'Teflon' Fowler is being reunited with his family to-day. Canadian PM said that no ransom demands - which involved the release of imprisoned terrorists - were met. Given that both Canadians still have their headquarters, it will remain to the forthcoming book to plumb the depths of AQ depravity. They probably had to sleep without fresh sheets and go without regular change of underwear.
